item.title: 英国金融科技巨头 Revolut 将收购法国巴黎银行在阿根廷的 Cetelem 公司
item.description: 据两位直接知情人士透露，欧洲最大的数字银行 Revolut Ltd. 正在收购阿根廷的 Banco Cetelem，这是一家由法国巴黎银行控股的小型地方贷款机构。【原文：Revolut Ltd., Europe’s largest digital bank, is acquiring Argentina’s Banco Cetelem, a small local lender owned by BNP Paribas, according to two people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 大多数美联储官员倾向于反对七月降息
item.description: 本周，美联储的一众官员明确表示，他们还需要几个月的时间才能获得信心，相信关税驱动的价格上涨不会持续加剧通胀。【原文：A flurry of Federal Reserve officials this week made clear they’ll need a few more months to gain confidence that tariff-driven price hikes won’t raise inflation in a persistent way.】

item.title: 华尔街全力追捧高风险股票
item.description: 随着 S&P 500 指数逼近历史新高，投资者纷纷涌入投机性和波动性较强的股市，将谨慎抛到九霄云外。【原文：Investors are piling into speculative and volatile edges of the stock market, throwing caution to the wind as the S&P 500 Index closes in on a new all-time high.】

item.title: 杰斐逊资本底价 1.5 亿美元首次公开募股后上涨 27
item.description: Jefferson Capital Inc. 公司及其部分支持者在首次公开募股中筹集了 1.5 亿美元，首次公开募股后股价涨幅高达 27%。【原文：Jefferson Capital Inc. shares rose as much as 27% in its public debut after the company and some of its backers raised $150 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 秘鲁铜矿投资者最担心非正规采矿业的蓬勃发展
item.description: 据秘鲁主要行业协会（SNMPE）负责人称，秘鲁开采更多巨型铜矿所面临的最大威胁是非正规和非法采矿活动的增加。【原文：The biggest threat to Peru tapping more of its giant copper deposits is rising informal and illegal mining activity, according to the head of the country’s main industry association, SNMPE.】

item.title: 赞比亚 2025 年将从国内市场额外借款 6.24 亿美元
item.description: 赞比亚财政部长西图姆贝科-穆索科特瓦内（Situmbeko Musokotwane）表示，赞比亚将从国内市场额外借款148亿克瓦查（约合6.24亿美元），以弥补今年预算中超出预期的缺口。【原文：Zambia will borrow an additional 14.8 billion kwacha ($624 million) from the domestic market to cover a bigger-than-expected shortfall in this year’s budget, Finance Minister Situmbeko Musokotwane said.】

item.title: 尼日利亚总统蒂努布签署新税法，迈出改革新步伐
item.description: 尼日利亚总统博拉-蒂努布（Bola Tinubu）签署了四项新税法，标志着他推动非洲人口最多国家经济改革的最新进展。【原文：Nigerian President Bola Tinubu has signed four new tax laws, marking the latest chapter in his push to reform the economy of Africa’s most populous nation.】

item.title: 国际米兰新增 3.5 亿欧元私人债务用于偿还债券
item.description: 国际米兰足球俱乐部（FC Internazionale Milano SpA）向机构投资者配售了 3.5 亿欧元（约合 4.1 亿美元）的私人债务，从而获得了偿还当前债券持有人的资金。【原文：FC Internazionale Milano SpA has placed €350 million ($410 million) of private debt with institutional investors, granting it the funds to repay current bondholders.】

item.title: 世贸组织称关税担忧加速进口，全球货物贸易增长
item.description: 在世界贸易组织的最新评估中，全球商品贸易加速增长，与关税囤积有关的进口激增超过了出口订单的放缓。【原文：Global merchandise trade accelerated in the World Trade Organization’s latest assessment, with a surge in imports tied to tariff stockpiling outweighing a slowdown in export orders.】

item.title: 特朗普的加密货币项目从阿联酋基金获得 1 亿美元投资
item.description: 一家鲜为人知的加密货币基金购买了 1 亿美元的世界自由金融公司（World Liberty Financial Inc.【原文：A little known crypto fund bought $100 million of World Liberty Financial Inc. tokens, the second Middle East-based investor to put money into the Trump family affiliated decentralized finance platform.】

item.title: 德国最大的天然气储存库仍空无一物，尽管已努力进行填充
item.description: 德国最大的天然气储存设施在最近一次拍卖中未能分配容量，这增加了德国在冬季到来之前难以达到具有法律约束力的储存目标的风险。【原文：Germany’s largest gas storage facility failed to allocate capacity at its latest auction, raising risks that the country will struggle to meet legally binding stockpiling targets ahead of winter.】

item.title: 艾伯塔省原住民称数据中心限制将阻碍人工智能蓬勃发展
item.description: 加拿大艾伯塔省的原住民社区正在反击各种限制，他们认为这些限制阻碍了对人工智能发展所需的新数据中心的投资。【原文：Indigenous communities in Canada’s Alberta province are pushing back on restrictions they say hinder investment in new data centers needed to power the growth of artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 不可能食品公司力争今年将植物汉堡列入欧洲菜单
item.description: 不可能食品公司（Impossible Foods Inc.【原文：Impossible Foods Inc. is set to add its plant-based burgers to European menus this year, ending a six-year quest to enter the world’s biggest market for meat alternatives.】

item.title: 小米推出售价 3.5 万美元的 SUV，将在中国挑战特斯拉 Model Y
item.description: 中国智能手机制造商小米公司（Xiaomi Corp. ）推出了一款售价 253,500 元（合 35,360 美元）的运动型多功能车，瞄准了特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Chinese smartphone maker Xiaomi Corp. is looking to shake off scrutiny of tech-enhanced driving systems with a 253,500 yuan ($35,360) sport utility vehicle that takes aim at Tesla Inc.’s popular Model Y.】

item.title: 72 亿美元的新兴市场基金加大地方债务赌注
item.description: 全球最大的新兴市场债券共同基金经理正在大肆收购本币债券，押注美元的持续下跌远未结束。【原文：A manager of the world’s largest mutual fund dedicated to emerging-market bonds is scooping up local currency debt, betting the dollar’s persistent decline is far from over.】

item.title: OpenAI 首席执行官和银行官员将在美联储银行资本会议上发言
item.description: 美联储概述了 7 月 22 日银行资本要求会议的议程，会议将讨论巴塞尔协议 III 的终局、压力测试框架、最大贷款机构的资本附加费和杠杆率要求。【原文：The Federal Reserve outlined the agenda for its July 22 conference on banks’ capital requirements, which will feature discussions on the Basel III endgame, the stress testing framework, the capital surcharge for the largest lenders and leverage requirements.】

item.title: 美国 5 月成屋销售回升，各地区均有增长
item.description: 美国 5 月份的二手房待售量在一个月前大幅下降后有所回升，但进入夏季后整体销售活动依然低迷。【原文：Pending sales of previously owned homes in the US picked up in May after a sharp decline a month earlier, although overall activity remained subdued headed into summer.】

item.title: 尽管副部长被免职，但民主党仍支持南非预算法案
item.description: 即使在西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）总统将该党的一名官员开除出行政部门后，南非联合政府中的第二大党仍将支持一项支撑预算的重要法律。【原文：The second-biggest party in South Africa’s coalition government will back a key law underpinning the budget even after President Cyril Ramaphosa fired one of its officials from his executive.】

item.title: 稳定币热潮推动 Coinbase 股价飙升至创纪录水平
item.description: Coinbase Global Inc. 的股价有望创下三年多来的首个纪录，为华尔街和华盛顿对加密货币行业日益认可所推动的涨势画上了句号。【原文：Coinbase Global Inc. shares are on track for their first record in more than three years, capping off a rally fueled by growing acceptance of the cryptocurrency industry on Wall Street and in Washington.】

item.title: 经济数据助推降息押注，国债反弹增添动力
item.description: 周四，在一系列美国经济数据支持美联储今年降息三次之后，短期国债反弹步伐加快。【原文：A rally in short-dated Treasuries gathered pace Thursday after a raft of US economic data on balance favored wagers on as many as three Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 德国公用事业公司 VNG 暂停对俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司的仲裁申请
item.description: 德国公用事业公司 VNG AG 已暂停对俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）的法律诉讼。【原文：German utility VNG AG has suspended its legal action against Russia’s Gazprom PJSC as the prospect of recovering funds dims, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 俄罗斯欲推出国家信使与应用巨头竞争
item.description: 俄罗斯计划推出一款国营信息应用程序，旨在托管一些政府服务，从而为 WhatsApp 和 Telegram 等现有平台提供一个本土竞争对手。【原文：Russia plans to launch a state-run messaging application that aims to host some government services, giving existing platforms like WhatsApp and Telegram a homegrown competitor in the country.】

item.title: 股票投资者在 680 亿美元缓冲基金热潮中获得新的安全交易机会
item.description: 在地缘政治冲击和关税消息每时每刻都在推高美股的时代，投资者保持观望是可以被原谅的，尽管在今年股市反弹的情况下，这样的决定代价高昂。现在，一家市值 800 亿美元的基金管理公司正在为那些希望在游戏中保持防御的投资者推出一项新策略。【原文：In an era where geopolitical shocks and tariff news push US stocks around by the hour, investors can be forgiven for remaining on the sidelines, though such a decision has been costly given the equity rebound this year. Now an $80 billion fund manager is introducing a new strategy for those looking to play defense while staying in the game.】

item.title: 新世界 110 亿美元再融资获 100%贷款人批准
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，陷入困境的香港建筑商新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co.【原文：Distressed Hong Kong builder New World Development Co. has secured written commitments from all banks for a HK$87.5 billion ($11.1 billion) loan refinancing, people familiar with the matter said, bringing it closer to finalizing a critical lifeline just days before a deadline.】

item.title: 特朗普提出鲍威尔继任人选，S&P 500 指数再创新高
item.description: 据报道，唐纳德-特朗普总统将提前宣布美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的接替人选，美股周四恢复攀升，S&P 500 指数涨幅收窄，创下历史新高。【原文：US stocks resumed their climb Thursday with the S&P 500 Index narrowing in on a record following a report President Donald Trump will announce his pick for Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell’s replacement earlier than anticipated.】

item.title: 简街将加入涌入阿布扎比的金融公司行列
item.description: 简街集团有限责任公司（Jane Street Group LLC）已向阿布扎比监管机构提交了在当地设立办事处的申请，这标志着阿布扎比在推动成为全球金融中心方面取得了重大胜利。【原文：Jane Street Group LLC has filed with regulators in Abu Dhabi to set up a local office, marking a significant win for the city that’s been pushing to become a global financial hub.】

item.title: 美联储戴利称关税影响减弱或为秋季减息打开大门
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）表示，她看到越来越多的证据表明，关税可能不会导致通胀大幅或持续飙升，这有助于支持秋季降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco President Mary Daly said she’s seeing increasing evidence that tariffs may not lead to a large or sustained inflation surge, helping bolster the case for a rate cut in the fall.】

item.title: 就在甘蔗糖厂放弃乙醇生产之际，巴西启动了生物燃料计划
item.description: 巴西为促进生物燃料发展而采取的最大措施之一，就是准备将过去几十年一直主导供应的生物燃料行业甩在身后。【原文：One of Brazil’s biggest steps to boost biofuels is poised to leave behind much of the industry that has dominated supplies for the past several decades.】

item.title: Amundi 表示客户要求在高波动性环境中进行套期保值
item.description: Amundi SA 表示，在今年一系列事件加剧波动之后，欧洲最大资产管理公司的机构客户正越来越多地寻求自我保护。【原文：Amundi SA said institutional clients at Europe’s largest asset manager are increasingly looking to protect themselves after a series of events this year boosted volatility.】

item.title: 消费者削减娱乐消费，美国 GDP 下调
item.description: 由于娱乐服务支出急剧下降，美国第一季度消费支出的增长速度为疫情爆发以来最弱。【原文：US consumer spending grew in the first quarter at the weakest pace since the onset of the pandemic as outlays for recreation services plunged.】
